00195 inline double min(const double a, const double b) { return (a < b) ? a : b; }
00196 
00200 inline double max(const double a, const double b) { return (a < b) ? b : a; }

00203 class INET_API SCTPPathVariables : public cPolymorphic
00204 {
00205     public:
00206         SCTPPathVariables(const IPvXAddress& addr, SCTPAssociation* assoc);
00207         ~SCTPPathVariables();
00208 
00209         SCTPAssociation*     association;
00210         IPvXAddress          remoteAddress;
00211 
00212         // ====== Path Management =============================================
00213         bool                activePath;
00214         bool                confirmed;
00215         bool                requiresRtx;
00216         bool                primaryPathCandidate;
00217         bool                forceHb;
00218         // ====== T3 Timer Handling ===========================================
00219         // Set to TRUE when CumAck has acknowledged TSNs on this path.
00220         // Needed to reset T3 timer.
00221         bool                newCumAck;                              // T.D. 05.12.2009
00222         // ====== Path Status =================================================
00223         uint32              pathErrorCount;
00224         uint32              pathErrorThreshold;
00225         uint32              pmtu;
00226         // ====== Congestion Control ==========================================
00227         uint32              cwnd;
00228         uint32              ssthresh;
00229         uint32              partialBytesAcked;
00230         uint32              queuedBytes;                            // T.D. 19.02.2010
00231         uint32              outstandingBytes;
00232         // ~~~~~~ Temporary storage for SACK handling ~~~~~~~
00233         uint32              outstandingBytesBeforeUpdate;   // T.D. 20.10.2009
00234         uint32              newlyAckedBytes;                        // T.D. 20.10.2009
00235         // ====== Fast Recovery ===============================================
00236         bool                fastRecoveryActive;                 // T.D. 21.11.2009
00237         uint32              fastRecoveryExitPoint;              // T.D. 21.11.2009
00238         simtime_t           fastRecoveryEnteringTime;           // T.D. 03.12.2009
00239         // ====== Lowest TSN (used for triggering T3 RTX Timer Restart) =======
00240         bool                findLowestTSN;                      // T.D. 08.12.2009
00241         bool                lowestTSNRetransmitted;         // T.D. 08.12.2009
00242 
00243         // ====== Timers ======================================================
00244         cMessage*           HeartbeatTimer;
00245         cMessage*           HeartbeatIntervalTimer;
00246         cMessage*           CwndTimer;
00247         cMessage*           T3_RtxTimer;
00248 
00249         // ====== Path Status =================================================
00250         simtime_t           heartbeatTimeout;
00251         simtime_t           heartbeatIntervalTimeout;
00252         simtime_t           rtxTimeout;
00253         simtime_t           cwndTimeout;
00254         simtime_t           updateTime;
00255         simtime_t           lastAckTime;
00256         simtime_t           pathRto;
00257         simtime_t           srtt;
00258         simtime_t           rttvar;
00259 
00260         // ====== Path Statistics =============================================
00261         unsigned int        gapAcksInLastSACK;
00262         unsigned int        gapNAcksInLastSACK;
00263         unsigned int        numberOfDuplicates;
00264         unsigned int        numberOfFastRetransmissions;
00265         unsigned int        numberOfTimerBasedRetransmissions;
00266 
00267         // ====== Output Vectors ==============================================
00268         cOutVector*         pathTSN;
00269         cOutVector*         pathRcvdTSN;
00270         cOutVector*         statisticsPathRTO;
00271         cOutVector*         statisticsPathRTT;
00272         cOutVector*         statisticsPathSSthresh;
00273         cOutVector*         statisticsPathCwnd;
00274 };

00278 class INET_API SCTPDataVariables : public cPolymorphic
00279 {
00280     public:
00281         SCTPDataVariables();
00282         ~SCTPDataVariables();
00283 
00284         inline void setInitialDestination(SCTPPathVariables* path) {
00285             initialDestination = path;
00286         }
00287         inline const IPvXAddress& getInitialDestination() const {
00288             if(initialDestination != NULL) {
00289                 return(initialDestination->remoteAddress);
00290             }
00291             return(zeroAddress);
00292         }
00293         inline SCTPPathVariables* getInitialDestinationPath() const {
00294             return(initialDestination);
00295         }
00296 
00297         inline void setLastDestination(SCTPPathVariables* path) {
00298             lastDestination = path;
00299         }
00300         inline const IPvXAddress& getLastDestination() const {
00301             if(lastDestination != NULL) {
00302                 return(lastDestination->remoteAddress);
00303             }
00304             return(zeroAddress);
00305         }
00306         inline SCTPPathVariables* getLastDestinationPath() const {
00307             return(lastDestination);
00308         }
00309 
00310         inline void setNextDestination(SCTPPathVariables* path) {
00311             nextDestination = path;
00312         }
00313         inline const IPvXAddress& getNextDestination() const {
00314             if(nextDestination != NULL) {
00315                 return(nextDestination->remoteAddress);
00316             }
00317             return(zeroAddress);
00318         }
00319         inline SCTPPathVariables* getNextDestinationPath() const {
00320             return(nextDestination);
00321         }
00322 
00323         cPacket*            userData;
00324         uint32              len;                                 // Different from wire
00325         uint32              booksize;
00326         uint32              tsn;
00327         uint16              sid;
00328         uint16              ssn;
00329         bool                enqueuedInTransmissionQ;     // In transmissionQ? Otherwise, it is just in retransmissionQ.
00330         bool                countsAsOutstanding;         // Is chunk outstanding?
00331         bool                hasBeenFastRetransmitted;
00332         bool                hasBeenAbandoned;
00333         bool                hasBeenReneged;              // Has chunk been reneged?
00334         bool                hasBeenAcked;                    // Has chunk been SACK'ed?
00335         bool                bbit;
00336         bool                ebit;
00337         bool                ordered;
00338         uint32              ppid;
00339         uint32              gapReports;
00340         simtime_t           enqueuingTime;
00341         simtime_t           sendTime;
00342         simtime_t           ackTime;
00343         simtime_t           expiryTime;
00344         uint32              numberOfRetransmissions;
00345         uint32              numberOfTransmissions;
00346         uint32              allowedNoRetransmissions;
00347 
00348     public:
00349         static const IPvXAddress zeroAddress;
00350 
00351     private:
00352         SCTPPathVariables* initialDestination;
00353         SCTPPathVariables* lastDestination;
00354         SCTPPathVariables* nextDestination;
00355 };

00480 class INET_API SCTPAssociation : public cObject
00481 {
00482     friend class SCTP;
00483     friend class SCTPPathVariables;
00484 
00485     // map for storing the path parameters
00486     typedef std::map<IPvXAddress,SCTPPathVariables*> SCTPPathMap;
00487     // map for storing the queued bytes per path
00488     typedef std::map<IPvXAddress, uint32> CounterMap;
00489     typedef struct counter {
00490         uint64    roomSumSendStreams;
00491         uint64    bookedSumSendStreams;
00492         uint64    roomSumRcvStreams;
00493         CounterMap roomTransQ;
00494         CounterMap bookedTransQ;
00495         CounterMap roomRetransQ;
00496     } QueueCounter;
00497     typedef struct calcBytesToSend {
00498         bool chunk;
00499         bool packet;
00500         uint32 bytesToSend;
00501     } BytesToBeSent;
00502     typedef struct congestionControlFunctions {
00503         void (SCTPAssociation::*ccInitParams)(SCTPPathVariables* path);
00504         void (SCTPAssociation::*ccUpdateAfterSack)();
00505         void (SCTPAssociation::*ccUpdateAfterCwndTimeout)(SCTPPathVariables* path);
00506         void (SCTPAssociation::*ccUpdateAfterRtxTimeout)(SCTPPathVariables* path);
00507         void (SCTPAssociation::*ccUpdateMaxBurst)(SCTPPathVariables* path);
00508         void (SCTPAssociation::*ccUpdateBytesAcked)(SCTPPathVariables* path, const uint32 ackedBytes, const bool ctsnaAdvanced);
00509     } CCFunctions;
00510     typedef std::map<uint32, SCTPSendStream*>       SCTPSendStreamMap;
00511     typedef std::map<uint32, SCTPReceiveStream*> SCTPReceiveStreamMap;
00512 
00513     public:
00514         // connection identification by apps: appgateIndex+assocId
00515         int32                   appGateIndex; // Application gate index
00516         int32                   assocId;        // Identifies connection within the app
00517         IPvXAddress             remoteAddr; // Remote address from last message
00518         IPvXAddress             localAddr;      // Local address from last message
00519         uint16                  localPort;      // Remote port from last message
00520         uint16                  remotePort; // Local port from last message
00521         uint32                  localVTag;      // Local verification tag
00522         uint32                  peerVTag;       // Remote verification tag
00523         bool                    listen;
00524 
00525         // Timers
00526         cMessage*               T1_InitTimer;
00527         cMessage*               T2_ShutdownTimer;
00528         cMessage*               T5_ShutdownGuardTimer;
00529         cMessage*               SackTimer;
00530         cMessage*               StartTesting;
00531 
00532     protected:
00533         AddressVector           localAddressList;
00534         AddressVector           remoteAddressList;
00535         uint32                  numberOfRemoteAddresses;
00536         uint32                  inboundStreams;
00537         uint32                  outboundStreams;
00538 
00539         int32                   status;
00540         uint32                  initTsn;
00541         uint32                  initPeerTsn;
00542         uint32                  sackFrequency;
00543         double                  sackPeriod;
00544         CCFunctions             ccFunctions;
00545         uint16                  ccModule;
00546 
00547         cOutVector*             advRwnd;
00548         cOutVector*             cumTsnAck;
00549         cOutVector*             sendQueue;
00550         cOutVector*             numGapBlocks;
00551 
00552         // Variables associated with the state of this association
00553         SCTPStateVariables*     state;
00554         BytesToBeSent           bytes;
00555         SCTP*                   sctpMain;                   // SCTP module
00556         cFSM*                   fsm;                            // SCTP state machine
00557         SCTPPathMap             sctpPathMap;
00558         QueueCounter            qCounter;
00559         SCTPQueue*              transmissionQ;
00560         SCTPQueue*              retransmissionQ;
00561         SCTPSendStreamMap       sendStreams;
00562         SCTPReceiveStreamMap    receiveStreams;
00563         SCTPAlgorithm*          sctpAlgorithm;
00564 
00565     public:
00569         SCTPAssociation(SCTP* mod, int32 appGateIndex, int32 assocId);
00573         ~SCTPAssociation();
00577         void sendOnPath(SCTPPathVariables* pathId, const bool firstPass = true);
00578         void sendOnAllPaths(SCTPPathVariables* firstPath);
00579 
00581         static const char* indicationName(const int32 code);
00582 
00583         /* @name Various getters */
00585         inline int32 getFsmState() const { return fsm->getState(); };
00586         inline SCTPStateVariables* getState() const { return state; };
00587         inline SCTPQueue* getTransmissionQueue() const { return transmissionQ; };
00588         inline SCTPQueue* getRetransmissionQueue() const { return retransmissionQ; };
00589         inline SCTPAlgorithm* getSctpAlgorithm() const { return sctpAlgorithm; };
00590         inline SCTP* getSctpMain() const { return sctpMain; };
00591         inline cFSM* getFsm() const { return fsm; };
00592         inline cMessage* getInitTimer() const { return T1_InitTimer; };
00593         inline cMessage* getShutdownTimer() const { return T2_ShutdownTimer; };
00594         inline cMessage* getSackTimer() const { return SackTimer; };
00595 
00597         static const char* stateName(const int32 state);
00598 
00599         static uint32 chunkToInt(const char* type);
00600 
00601         /* Process self-messages (timers).
00602         * Normally returns true. A return value of false means that the
00603         * connection structure must be deleted by the caller (SCTPMain).
00604         */
00605         bool processTimer(cMessage* msg);
00611         bool processSCTPMessage(SCTPMessage* sctpmsg, const IPvXAddress& srcAddr, const IPvXAddress& destAddr);
00617         bool processAppCommand(cPacket* msg);
00618         void removePath();
00619         void removePath(const IPvXAddress& addr);
00620         void deleteStreams();
00621         void stopTimer(cMessage* timer);
00622         void stopTimers();
00623         inline SCTPPathVariables* getPath(const IPvXAddress& pathId) const {
00624             SCTPPathMap::const_iterator iterator = sctpPathMap.find(pathId);
00625             if (iterator !=sctpPathMap.end()) {
00626                 return iterator->second;
00627             }
00628             return NULL;
00629         }

00878         inline void ackChunk(SCTPDataVariables* chunk) {
00879             chunk->hasBeenAcked = true;
00880         }
00881         inline void unackChunk(SCTPDataVariables* chunk) {
00882             chunk->hasBeenAcked = false;
00883         }
00884         inline bool chunkHasBeenAcked(const SCTPDataVariables* chunk) const {
00885             return(chunk->hasBeenAcked);
00886         }
00887         inline bool chunkHasBeenAcked(const uint32 tsn) const {
00888             const SCTPDataVariables* chunk = retransmissionQ->getChunk(tsn);
00889             if(chunk) {
00890                 return(chunkHasBeenAcked(chunk));
00891             }
00892             return(false);
00893         }
